posts.title: Information as the Foundation of Reality
posts.author: Michael K. Baines
posts.excerpt: What if information isn't just a way to describe reality, but the actual substance of reality itself? Exploring the radical implications of information-theoretic physics.

posts.title: Consciousness and Quantum Observation
posts.author: Michael K. Baines
posts.excerpt: The measurement problem in quantum mechanics has puzzled physicists for decades. Could consciousness be the missing piece? An exploration of observer-dependent reality.

posts.title: The COSMIC Framework: An Introduction
posts.author: Michael K. Baines
posts.excerpt: A comprehensive overview of the COSMIC Framework and how it unifies information theory, consciousness, and fundamental physics into a coherent whole.

michael_baines.name: Michael K. Baines
michael_baines.bio: Creator of the COSMIC Framework and author of The Big TOE
